# Introduction 

+ Data source: This breast cancer single cell data was comprised of 4 different batches from a single experiment. 


| Type of merge |   | Name   |   | ID        | Author | DOI or URL                 | Protocol     | Organism | Tissue        | # of cell types | # of cells | # of batches |
|---------------|---|--------|---|-----------|--------|----------------------------|--------------|----------|---------------|-----------------|------------|--------------|
|               |   | Breast |   | GSE113197 | Nguyen | 10.1038/s41467-018-04334-1 | 10x Chromium | Human    | Breast cancer | 3               | 24520      | 4            |



+ `scMerge` parameters for normalisation: 

    - Unsupervised scMerge
    - kmeans K = (4,3,4,3)
    - Negative controls are human scSEG

    
+ Relation to the `scMerge` article: Supplementary Figure 6. 


# Biological novelty

In addition to the batch effects, this data is large with 24,520 cells (10x Chromium protocol) which poses dimensionality challenges to normalisation.
